sentence.Network_en: The bottle cap popped off and he got an eyeful of seltzer.
sentence.Network_cn: 瓶盖砰地一声打开,喷得他满眼都是矿泉水.

sentence.Network_en: He gave Jimmy a seltzer on the spot.
sentence.Network_cn: 他递给基米一杯赛尔脱兹矿泉水.

sentence.Network_en: This product with Br 2 was obtained 2 - bromo - 4,5 - hydroxymethoxybenzaldehyde through bromination.
sentence.Network_cn: 再溴代得到2-溴 -4,5-二甲氧基苯甲醛,收率为91.9%,并分析溴代过程中甲酰基的邻位效应及溴代产物的稳定性.

auth_sentence.content: Seltzer expects a resolution in the case only after a long appeals process.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seltzer expects a resolution in the case only after a long appeals process.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seltzer expects a resolution in the case only after a long appeals process.

auth_sentence.content: The drugs, including bromo-dragonfly and MDPV, are often marketed as plant food to evade regulations.
auth_sentence.res_content: The drugs, including bromo-dragonfly and MDPV, are often marketed as plant food to evade regulations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The drugs, including bromo-dragonfly and MDPV, are often marketed as plant food to evade regulations.

auth_sentence.content: Suffice it to say that this is not something you notice when you talk to Seltzer.
